select hidnum, hidname from headid t1, bcategory t2 where t1.catnum = t2.catnum

mapper.select: select t1.bnum, t2.catname as "bcategory.catname", t2.catnum as "bcategory.catnum", t4.hidname as "hidcategory.hidname", t4.hidnum as "hidcategory.hidnum", t3.nickname as bnickname, t1.btitle, t1.bcontent, t1.bcdate, t1.budate from board t1, bcategory t2, member t3, headid t4 where t1.bcategory = t2.catnum and t1.ucode = t3.ucode and t1.hidcategory = t4.hidnum and bnum = #{bnum}
mapper.update: update board set bhits = bhits+1 where bnum = #{bnum}
